-novid -nojoy -language colormod -tickrate 128 -freq 144
400dpi 2.2sens 0.7zoom 1000hz
1024x768 bb
ec2, g-sr, anne pro2 gateron brown, cloud silver

cl_crosshairalpha 255; cl_crosshaircolor 0; cl_crosshairdot 0; cl_crosshairgap 0; cl_crosshairsize 2; cl_crosshairstyle 6; cl_crosshairusealpha 1; cl_crosshairthickness 0; cl_crosshair_sniper_width 2; cl_crosshair_drawoutline 1; cl_crosshaircolor_b -255, cl_crosshaircolor_g -255, cl_crosshaircolor_r 100

I recommend this, because i put a lot of my time into this game. And it's really fun to play with your friends, dosen't matter if you are trying or just having fun. It's just a good game, BUT you can't play it for free IF you don't want to play with cheaters. You will still be facing cheaters if you don't have a good trust factor, theres tons of guides how to get a good trust factor.
